column3: Murdered Mary & Brenda Parsh in Carbondale, Illinois; stalked Mary, Brenda sexually assaulted, both shot in head
Murdered Sheila Cole in Carbondale, Missouri; abducted from Walmart in Cape Girardeau, Missouri & taken to his trailer in Carbondale, Illinois; sexually assaulted & shot on way back to Cape Girardeau
During this time, also began sexually molesting an 11-year old girl (daughter of an acquaintance); continued for next 2 years
Murdered Virginia Lee Witte in Marion, Illinois; sexually assaulted, stabbed, & strangled
Krajcir is released from parole.
Krajcir is arrested in Carbondale, IL and charged with taking indecent liberties with a child (the 13-year old daughter of his landlord).
Murdered Joyce Tharp (29); sexually assaulted in Paducah, Kentucky then abducted/ taken to Carbondale, Illinois; murdered by strangulation; then taken back to Paducah, KY & dumped
Murdered Myrtle Rupp (51) in South Temple, Pennsylvania; stalked, sexually assaulted & strangled
Sexually assaulted a 49-year old woman
Sentenced to over 2 years for child molestation
Recommended for conditional early release from prison (by psychiatrists!)
Released early from Menard Correctional Center
Moved to new trailer; also got job at a junior college in Southeast Missouri
Assaulted Ida White (assaulted & stabbed, but Ida lived). Police arrested & falsely convicted Grover Thompson for the assault; he later died in prison in 1996
Krajcir receives his bachelor’s degree in administration of justice from Southern Illinois University.  He minored in psychology.
Sexually assaulted a woman  in Cape Girardeau, Missouri
Sexually assaulted a woman; 2nd attack on this woman; had young daughter with her both times (at 5 yrs old & 11 yrs old)
Murdered Margie Call in Cape Girardeau, Missouri; stalked, raped, tied up, & strangled
Murdered Deborah Sheppard (23) in Carbondale, Illinois; stalked, raped, strangled
Sexually assaulted three women aged 24, 27, and 28
Robbed Elza & Eunice Seabaugh (79)
Murdered Mildred Wallace (65)  in Cape Girardeau, Missouri; blindfolded, raped, & shot in head; took cash from purse
In Allentown, PA: robbed a mother & daughter, assaulted daughter, & took cash; also broke into house of an elderly woman & groped her (dates unspecified)
Police form a major-case squad

Arrested in a shopping center parking lot near Allentown, PA; A Woman called police and reported a suspicious man sitting in a car; police found Krajcir in his car with a .25 caliber pistol in his lap (had been hunting for next victim). Taken into custody at the Lehigh County Prison in Allentown, PA on charges of “suspicion of breaking the law” and possession of a firearm (parole violation)
Attempted to escape from prison in Allentown, PA, but broke his leg in the process and failed
Tried and convicted for assaults committed in PA; found guilty of indecent assault, robbery, and criminal trespassing charges
Sentenced to 2 ½ - 5 yrs. In PA prison
Served 5 years in the Pennsylvania State Correctional Institution at Graterford
Moved to Big Muddy Correction Center in Ina, Illinois to serve sentences for parole violations & for violating his prior conditional release
Decided he didn’t want to hurt anyone anymore & the best way to do that was to stay in prison; stopped trying to convince officials he wanted to change & never attended
another therapy session
column4: another therapy session

column3:

Sheppard, Krajcir was interviewed by police, eventually confessed, and was arrested for the murder of Deborah Sheppard.

column4: Deal was offered to drop death penalty for full disclosure; families of victims agreed
